bug.author: spees
bug.summary: CH, APS and BT statuses overlap on inky displays.
bug.description:
Describe the bug CH, APS and BT statuses overlap on inky displays. Might apply to other displays, but cannot confirm. The CH and APs overlap will only happen when scanning on certain channels. * and single digit channels are fine. BT and last total recon APs will always overlap. The more APs, the worse it looks. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Simply run stock pwnagotchi with inky display. BT issue only applies when using the bt-tether plugin.
Expected behavior Nothing to say here other than have a clean UI. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
All versions including build straight from git. Pi0w with inky 3 color, but set to black.
Additional context PR with fix has been submitted.
